This glasses help you see your opponents weak spot and deal devastating critical damage with your sorcery
item.monsterspellbooks.ignition_gloves.d: The gloves of the legendary Fire Alchemist
item.monsterspellbooks.brimstone_sigil.d: Dealing Fire Spell Damage inflicts Brimstone Flame and adds a stack of Immolation
item.monsterspellbooks.brimstone_sigil.i: At 3 Immolation stacks, cause an explosion (%s damage), spreading Immolation
item.monsterspellbooks.dreadhound_tooth_: Dealing Blood Spell Damage inflicts Bleeding and adds a stack of Hemorrhage
item.monsterspellbooks.brimstone_sigil.h: At 3 Hemorrhage stacks, cause an explosion (%s damage), spreading Hemorrhage
item.monsterspellbooks.dwarven_power_cor: Dealing Lighting Spell Damage adds a stack of Static
item.monsterspellbooks.obsidian_medal.de: A medal made of the void,given to only the bravest soldiers
item.monsterspellbooks.blizzard_caller.d: Increases the strength of the power of ice you imbue yourself with
item.monsterspellbooks.orb_soul.desc: A solid orb of banished souls,the greatest achievement for a necromancer,the key to Lichdom
item.monsterspellbooks.cross_necklace.de: Makes your prayer louder for your deity
effect.monsterspellbooks.hemorrhage.desc: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Hemorrhage, the creature explodes, dealing damage and Hemorrhaging nearby creatures
display.monsterspellbooks.curse_warning: What a terrible night to have a Curse
tooltip.monsterspellbooks.frostmourne_pa: Dealing Ice Spell Damage inflicts Wither and dealing Necro Spell Damage inflicts Freezing
tooltip.monsterspellbooks.paladin_passiv: A heavy holy hammer that acts just like the mace of the trial chambers
tooltip.monsterspellbooks.endersent_crus: A heavy obsidian hammer that acts just like the mace of the trial chambers
tooltip.monsterspellbooks.flesh_maiden_p: A once beautiful women that got experimented on her wedding day,now makes you immune to the consequences of Heartstop
spell.monsterspellbooks.air_bubble.guide: Form an invisible bubble around your target to grant them almost unlimited water breathing
spell.monsterspellbooks.air_propulsion.g: Use the power of aeromancy to propel yourself and option flight for a short time
spell.monsterspellbooks.steam_stream.gui: Hold to spew a cone of fire outwards,burning slightly anything it touches..Damage scales with Aero Spell Power and Fire Spell Power
spell.monsterspellbooks.suffocate.guide: Drain the air from your targets lungs to suffocate them on air
In a radius around a targeted creature,apply the Anti Heal Effect to enemies,preventing them from healing in any way
spell.monsterspellbooks.blood_thorn.guid: Shot a singular thorn of hardened blood,piercing and damaging enemies, healing you for 2% of damage done
spell.monsterspellbooks.blood_pierce.gui: Shot a concentrated beam of piercing blood from your blood moon scythe to deal massive damage and inflict rend on the target
spell.monsterspellbooks.hysteria.guide: Go all in,either you die or your opponent does,increases your attack damage and speed and inflicts yourself with Heartstop
spell.monsterspellbooks.sanguinite_evisc: Slash forward with your claws to inflict heavy bleeding.The damage scales off of your held weapon´s melee damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.crush.guide: Crush your target with a powerful burst of gravitational force to force them to stay on the ground
spell.monsterspellbooks.crushing_presenc: Manifest your aura into a crushing aura that slows enemies movement and casting speed just by being near them
Smash the ground with the force of an Endersent,making targets susceptible to kinetic damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.gravity_well.gui: Stab the ground and pull enemies towards you,stunning them for a short time
spell.monsterspellbooks.gravity_force.gu: Imbue yourself with the power of gravity,increasing your attack damage and speed
spell.monsterspellbooks.space_rupture.gu: Launch a space distortion ball that explodes on impact to the ground,bouncing off blocks and leaving a distortion field where it lands and damaging creatures it phases through
spell.monsterspellbooks.aegis_patrol.gui: Summon a squad of holy golems to defeat the force of evil with
spell.monsterspellbooks.divine_intervent: Pray for divine intervention,causing a burst of holy energy that knocks down enemies and then calls upon a sunbeam to damage any enemy left nearby
spell.monsterspellbooks.paladin_throw.gu: Launch a holy hammer forward that moves forward,damaging creatures it phases through abd bounces once on blocks.The damage scales off of your held weapon´s melee damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.brimstone_buzzsa: Launch a searing buzzsaw made of brimstone flame that melts the defense of the enemies it pierces and bouncing off blocks
Hold to launch a ray of pure brimstone flames that burns any creature it hits,leaving you stuck in place
spell.monsterspellbooks.cauterizing_touc: Burn your targets skin and soul making it impossible for them to heal in any way.The damage scales off of your held weapon´s melee damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.frenzied_burst.g: Shot a thin burst of pure frenzy flame,inflicting madness to lower your targets maximum mana reserves.Damage scales with Fire Spell Power and Eldritch Spell Power
spell.monsterspellbooks.frenzied_storm.g: Hold to unleash a barrage of heavy frenzy flames,shooting rapidly but wildly in front of you and exploding on impact.Damage scales with Fire Spell Power and Eldritch Spell Power
spell.monsterspellbooks.frenzy_surge.gui: Emanate a continuous surge of frenzy and heat as you scream,igniting and instigating madness in creatures around you.Damage scales with Fire Spell Power and Eldritch Spell Power
spell.monsterspellbooks.overheat.guide: Overheat yourself to gain extra damage and fire spell power at the cost of melting part of your own armor and burn everything you touch
spell.monsterspellbooks.napalm_orb.guide: Throw a orb of napalm,splashing in a radius upon impact and covering creatures hit,making their bodies flammable and weak to fire magic
Cast to conjure a blizzard centered around yourself,which strikes nearby creatures within sight with small clouds of frost every 2 seconds for the spell´s duration
spell.monsterspellbooks.frost_coating.gu: The great power of ice infuses itself into your skin granting armor for a duration
spell.monsterspellbooks.ice_arsenal.guid: Fire a single burst of ice sword to your opponent.Level increases sword number
spell.monsterspellbooks.tundra_terrain.g: Conjure protective rings of Ice Spikes around you
spell.monsterspellbooks.ancient_flash.gu: Boost your strike with ancient lighting to strike your target multiple times in a single cast.The damage scales off of your held weapon´s melee damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.ancient_lightnin: Hold to charge multiple spears made from ancient sparks.Release to throw it like a javalin,dealing high damage and creating static fields
spell.monsterspellbooks.guardians_neutra: Shot fine rays of paralyzing plasma from your eyes to neutralize any intruder that you see like a true guardian would
spell.monsterspellbooks.raigo.guide: Manifest and throw a ball of thunderstorm,exploding and dealing massive damage on impact
spell.monsterspellbooks.static_cleave.gu: Launch a slash of pure static that phases through solid matter and paralyzes anything it touches
spell.monsterspellbooks.thunder_step.gui: Teleport to where you are looking and generate a chain lighting wherever you appear again
spell.monsterspellbooks.thunderstorm_wav: Conjure a protective ancient thunderstorm around you like an ancient electromancer would do
spell.monsterspellbooks.beast_howl.guide: Release a damaging howl that leaves your targets paralyzed and stunned while you gain a primordial strength
Increases your size and stats giving you extra attack knockback and knockback resistance
spell.monsterspellbooks.poison_quill.gui: Shot a small poison quill,damaging and poisoning whatever it hits
spell.monsterspellbooks.summon_poison_vi: Summon Poison Quill Vines to act as turrets for you
spell.monsterspellbooks.reaper_aspect.gu: Instill yourself with necrotic magic,dealing additional melee,ranged,or spell damage towards creatures that are withering
spell.monsterspellbooks.banshee_scream.g: Release a horrible scream that wither any life that hears it
spell.monsterspellbooks.bone_dagger.guid: Shot a small bone dagger,damaging whatever it hits
spell.monsterspellbooks.conjure_death_kn: Summons the once elite guards of the Withered Fortress,imposing creatures that obey their master
spell.monsterspellbooks.fall_curse.guide: A curse long forgotten than reduces your target to a defenseless state in many ways
spell.monsterspellbooks.graveyard_fissur: Skeleton hands come out of the ground to damage any creature they grab,
spell.monsterspellbooks.life_drain.guide: Absorb the life force of your target,making them weak while healing you for 100% of the damage done
spell.monsterspellbooks.lichdom.guide: Abandon your humanity to gain the ability to resurrect once and gain soul form once the effect is activated
spell.monsterspellbooks.putrescence_mass: Launch a mass made from putrescence ,dissolving on impact and leaving a field of putrescence where it lands
spell.monsterspellbooks.rancorcall.guide: Hold to unleash a barrage of soul fired skulls,shooting rapidly but wildly in front of you
spell.monsterspellbooks.soul_firebolt.gu: Soul Firebolt that ignores I frames,exclusive to soul wizard
spell.monsterspellbooks.soul_chain.guide: Launch a chain made out of your soul to strike your targets soul and the others close to it,linking their body so they are unable to teleport
spell.monsterspellbooks.soul_form.guide: Turn your corporeal body into a nearly untouchable soul making it physically weaker but granting you the speed of the souls
spell.monsterspellbooks.soul_scorch.guid: In a targeted area,erupt a scorch of soul fire burning the soul of creatures in the zone and leaving a soul fire field
spell.monsterspellbooks.spectral_blast.g: Fires multiple blasts of spectral energy that builds up the Lethargy effect.Land all shots at max level to inflict a health decreasing effect.Level increases recasts
spell.monsterspellbooks.spirit_strike.gu: Unleash a sweeping melee attack in the form of a wreath of soul fire that renders the soul incapable of regenerating mana and slowly burn their mana reserves in soul fire.This spell is uninterruptible.The damage scales off of your held weapon´s melee damage
spell.monsterspellbooks.stray_grasp.guid: Fire a frozen skeletal hand,inflicting chilling to those it grasps .Damage scales with Necro Spell Power and Ice Spell Power
spell.monsterspellbooks.summon_soul_wiza: Cast to conjure soul wizards that will follow you and launch soul firebolts at your enemies
spell.monsterspellbooks.vile_slash.guide: Slash forward to send out a concentrated blade of spectral energy,slicing through creatures to wither their body and soul and healing 15% of damage done
spell.monsterspellbooks.vile_summon.guid: Summon a ravenous horde of Vile Skeletons that attack anything that isn't their caster,striping their armor and withering their flesh
spell.monsterspellbooks.wither_bomb.guid: Fire an enhanced wither skull which home towards your cursor,or the creature your cursor is targeting,exploding and dealing massive damage on impact
spell.monsterspellbooks.wither_nova.guid: Release the cataclysmic force of a collapsing nether star in a giant beam that destroys all life in its way but making you unable to move while and shortly afher casting
